segments.text: What are the requirements that you need to do the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want someone who can operate the common office equipments and have special skills in photography .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can handle that . I can operate word - processor , fax machine , photostat , and other office equipments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think of your own qualification ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a master's degree and I meet all the needs you want , so I am confident of doing this job well .
segments.speaker: S1
